title: Firecrawl Web Scraping and Crawling
description: AI-powered web scraping and crawling capabilities using Firecrawl

firecrawl_scrape.title: Firecrawl Scrape
firecrawl_scrape.description: Scrape single web pages and REPLACE any existing indexed content for that URL. Unlike regular scrape, this prevents duplicate content when re-scraping the same page. Use this to refresh/update content from a previously scraped URL.

firecrawl_crawl.title: Firecrawl Crawl
firecrawl_crawl.description: Crawl entire websites and extract content from multiple pages. Can follow links, handle JavaScript-rendered content, and extract structured data from entire websites.

firecrawl_query_indexed_content.title: Query Indexed Content
firecrawl_query_indexed_content.description: Query previously indexed Firecrawl content to find relevant information and answer questions. Use this to search through content that was scraped and indexed using Firecrawl tools.

firecrawl_clear_indexed_content.title: Clear Indexed Content
firecrawl_clear_indexed_content.description: Clear all previously indexed Firecrawl content from the vector store. This will permanently delete all indexed content and cannot be undone. Use this tool when you want to start fresh with new content.

states.description: States for each Firecrawl skill (disabled, public, or private)

rate_limit_number.title: Rate Limit Number
rate_limit_number.description: Number of requests allowed per time window

rate_limit_minutes.title: Rate Limit Minutes
rate_limit_minutes.description: Time window in minutes for rate limiting
